info.title: Reisetagebuch API Draft
info.description: This is a draft version of the Reisetagebuch API documentation. The API is still under development and may change in future releases. Use at your own risk!

get.description: List invite codes for the authenticated user

post.description: Prefetch location data and optionally store user history

get.description: Return a recent location matching the requested coordinates
Search for locations near a point or by query
Geocode a query using configured providers
Return location history for the authenticated user for a given day
Return departures for a given point or station identifier
Return stopovers for a given trip start
Get a LineString geometry between two locations
Get stop points between two locations as MultiPoint geometry
Returns paginated posts for the authenticated user timeline

get.summary: Get posts for a specific user
get.description: Returns paginated posts for a specific user

patch.description: Update a post (text, transport or location)

parameters.name: travelReason
parameters.description: Filter by travel reason (e.g., WORK, LEISURE)

put.description: Update transport-specific fields of a post
Update transport times for a transport post

get.description: Return GeoJSON map data for a user
Return profile data for a user

DeparturesDto.description: Data Transfer Object for Departures at a Stop

DeparturesResponseDto.description: Data Transfer Object for Departures Response

modes.description: Filter modes applied to the request

requestTime.description: Time when the request was made

items.description: Array of post items on the current page

likedByUser.description: Indicates if the post is liked by the user

likeCount.description: Total number of likes on the post

LocationHistoryDto.description: Data Transfer Object for Location History

tokens.description: An array of tokens representing parts of the location name or identifier

identifier.description: A unique identifier for the location

level.description: The level or floor of the location, if applicable

street.description: The street name of the location, if applicable

houseNumber.description: The house number of the location, if applicable

zip.description: The ZIP code of the location, if applicable

areas.description: An array of area names or identifiers associated with the location

score.description: The confidence score of the geocode result

MotisStopDto.description: Data Transfer Object for a Stop

distance.description: Distance to the stop in meters

items.description: Array of post items on the current page

StopoversResponseDto.description: Data Transfer Object for Stopovers Response

TripCreationResponseDto.description: Data Transfer Object for Trip Creation Response

tripId.description: The identifier of the created trip (foreign trip id)

startId.description: The identifier of the starting location of the trip

startTime.description: The departure time of the trip in ISO 8601 format

TravelReason.description: Reasons for travel associated with transport posts

ProfileUpdateRequest.title: Profile Update Request
ProfileUpdateRequest.description: Request schema for updating user profile information

name.description: The full name of the user

username.description: The unique username for the user (lowercase, alphanumeric, dashes, and underscores only)

email.description: The email address of the user (lowercase)

motisRadius.description: Radius for Motis suggestions in meters (allowed values: 50, 100, 200, 500)

expires_at.description: The expiration date of the invite code

mode.description: The mode of transport for the trip.

routeLongName.description: The long name of the route.

tripShortName.description: The short name of the trip.

displayName.description: The display name of the trip.

origin.description: The origin location of the trip.

originType.description: The type of identifier used for the origin (id or identifier).

destination.description: The destination location of the trip.

destinationType.description: The type of identifier used for the destination (id or identifier).

departureTime.description: The departure time of the trip.

arrivalTime.description: The arrival time of the trip.

stops.description: An array of stops for the trip.

identifierType.description: The type of identifier used for the stop (id or identifier).

order.description: The order of the stop in the trip sequence.

stopId.description: The ID of the transport trip stop, the user wants to exit at.

manualDepartureTime.description: The manually set departure time for the transport post.

manualArrivalTime.description: The manually set arrival time for the transport post.

id.description: The unique identifier of the invite code

createdAt.description: The creation timestamp of the invite code

expiresAt.description: The expiration timestamp of the invite code

usedAt.description: The timestamp when the invite code was used

distance.description: Distance to the location in meters

LocationHistoryEntryDto.description: Location History Entry Data Transfer Object

type.description: Type of the location history entry

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the location history entry in ISO 8601 format

hashTags.description: List of hashtags associated with the post

likesCount.description: Number of likes on the post

likedByUser.description: Indicates if the post is liked by the current user

metaInfos.description: Additional meta information associated with the post

travelReason.description: Reason for travel associated with the location post

manualDepartureTime.description: Manually specified departure time in ISO 8601 format

manualArrivalTime.description: Manually specified arrival time in ISO 8601 format

travelReason.description: Reason for travel associated with the transport post

StopDto.description: Data Transfer Object for a Transport Trip Stop

arrivalTime.description: Scheduled arrival time in ISO 8601 format

departureTime.description: Scheduled departure time in ISO 8601 format

TripDto.description: Data Transfer Object for a Transport Trip

routeColor.description: Color of the route in HEX format

routeTextColor.description: Text color of the route in HEX format

TripHistoryEntryDto.description: Trip History Entry Data Transfer Object

geometry.description: Geometry of the trip as a GeoJSON LineString

avatar.description: URL of the user avatar image

header.description: URL of the user header image

tags.name: Posts
tags.description: Operations related to posts created by users
